item.title: Fortnite: All Chapter 6 Season 2 Accolades
item.description:
Accolades have been in Fortnite for a few years now, but a few seasons ago, Epic Games decided that it wanted fans to take them more seriously than ever. Before, gamers would be rewarded XP for completing certain Accolades, but unless they memorized them after getting them for the first time, there was no way of knowing what they had to do to unlock them.

This is why an Accolades collection was added to Fortnite , allowing players to check them at any time they'd like. This feature incentivizes fans to try to complete all Accolades available and acquire them as many times as possible so they can compare their stats with their friends near the end of the season.

Updated on March 4, 2025, by Ashely Claudino: As is standard whenever a Fortnite season launches, Epic Games reset and changed many of the Accolades available in Chapter 6 Season 2. This season, many Accolades changed categories and 71 were removed or entirely. While before gamers were rewarded for various tiers of similar Accolades, many of them were vaulted and replaced by a medium-difficulty version, rather than allowing fans to finish the easiest and hardest tiers.

How to Get Accolades in Fortnite

There are 100 Accolades to unlock in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2 , 71 less than last season. Accolades work like in-game achievements, and players will naturally unlock most of them simply by playing Fortnite Battle Royale. However, some of them require gamers to do specific tasks in-game, and they won't be able to get them unless they check out the Accolades list in the Collection tab. The Collection tab can be found in the Quests menu, which can be accessed while in the lobby .

Players should make a note of the Accolades they'd like to unlock and then play a match following its exact requirements . For example, the "Knife to a Gun Fight" Accolade can only be obtained if the player wins a match only dealing damage with melee weapons - doing this by chance is nearly impossible.

Complete Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2 Accolades List

Here are the various Accolade categories in Fortnite :

First in Match Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Early Bird First player to pick up a legendary or better item
2 Finders Keepers First player to collect a weapon from an eliminated player
3 First Strike First player to get an elimination
4 Quick Exit First player to be eliminated
5 Battle Ready First player to reach maximum shields
6 First Landing First player to touch the ground
7 Smash and Grab First player to search a chest
8 Ammo Ace First player to search an ammo box
9 First Supply Drop First player to search a supply drop
10 First Catch First player to catch a fish
11 Adventure Buddies First player to hire a character
12 Fast Talker First player to talk with a character
13 The Gift of Life First player to reboot a player
14 Patch Up, Pronto! First player to revive a player
15 Shopping Spree First player to purchase an item

Weapons Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Rapid Rampage 1,000 Assault Rifle damage in a match
2 Shell Shocked 1,000 Shotgun damage in a match
3 Subtle Savagery 1,000 SMG damage in a match
4 Steady Sharpshooter 1,000 Sniper Rifle damage in a match
5 Pinpoint Precision 1,000 Pistol damage in a match
6 Blade Barrage 1,000 Melee damage in a match
7 Boom Boss 1,000 Explosive damage in a match
8 High Caliber Hail 1,000 Shots fired in a match
9 Road Rage 1,000 Damage while in a vehicle in a match
10 Right Back at You 1,000 Damage to players that have damaged you in a match
11 Jack of All Trades Deal damage with 5 different weapon types in a match
12 One Man's Trash Only deal damage with Common Weapons and win
13 One Man's Treasure Only deal damage with Legendary Weapons or better and win

Combat Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Single Digit 5 Eliminations in a match
2 Double Digits 10 Eliminations in a match
3 Elimination Collector 15 Eliminations in a match
4 Elimination Hoarder 20 Eliminations in a match
5 Elimination Escapade 25 Eliminations in a match
6 Anti-Air Personnel Hit an airborne player
7 Double Elimination 2 Eliminations within a short duration
8 Multi Elimination 3 Eliminations within a short duration
9 Mega Elimination 4 Eliminations within a short duration
10 Ultra Elimination 5 Eliminations within a short duration
11 Impossible Shot Player downed over 250 meters away
12 First to the Feast Eliminate a player within 10 seconds of landing
13 Who's the Boss Defeated a Boss
14 Vengeful Revenge Eliminate a player that eliminated you in a match
15 Off the Dome 25 Headshots hit in a match

Victory Royale Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Against the World Win a Squads match as a Solo
2 Three to One Odds Win a Trios match as a Solo
3 Two to One Odds Win a Duos match as a Solo
4 Pacifist Win a match without eliminating an opponent
5 True Pacifist Win a match without damaging an opponent
6 This One's For You Win a match after thanking the Bus Driver
7 I'm Fine, Really Win a match without restoring health
8 Who Needs 'Em Win a match without gaining shields
9 There's No Time Win a match without reloading
10 This Isn't Zero Build? Win a match in Build Mode without building
11 Maximum Overshields Win a match without losing health
12 Knife to a Gun Fight Win a match only dealing damage with melee weapons
13 Storm Runner Win a match without taking storm damage
14 Royal Preservation Win a match with a Victory Crown
15 All Hail the Crown 10 Eliminations while wearing a crown

Survival Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Survivor I 50 Players remaining
2 Survivor II 25 Players remaining
3 Survivor III 10 Players remaining
4 Medical Miracle 500 Health restored in a match
5 Shield Sentinel 500 Shields gained in a match
6 Batten the Hatches 500 Storm damage survived in a match
7 Fruits and Veggies 5 different fruits or vegetables consumed in a single match
8 Actually Use Bandages Bandages used during a match
9 Relentless Revived 3 times in a match
10 Celebrated Crawler 50 meters traveled while DBNO

Resources Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Loot Stockpiler 10 Chests searched in a match
2 Ammo Scavenger 10 Ammo boxes searched in a match
3 High Roller 1,000 Bars spent in a match
4 Treasure Trove 1,000 Bars collected in a match
5 Demolition Domination 100 Structures destroyed in a match
6 Fishmonger 10 Fish caught in a match
7 Bustling Builder 100 Structures built in a match
8 Feed Finder 5 Foragables collected in a match
19 Bottomless Clip 1.000 Ammo collected in a match
20 Resourcefulness 1.000 Resources collected in a match

Social Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Reboot Revenge Win a match after being rebooted
2 The Royal Party Each squad member is holding a Victory Crown in a match
3 Stay Down Eliminated a player that was rebooted in a match
4 Carrying 3 Revives in a match
5 Reboot Van Rebooting... 3 Reboots in a match
6 Support Class 3 Assists in a match
7 Hype Squad 60 Seconds jamming with players in a match
8 Hired Gun Follower downed or eliminated a player
9 Helping Hand Follower revived player or squad member
10 Head on a Swivel 10 Opponents marked by Scout Specialists in a match
11 Collateral Damage 250 Damage dealt by Heavy Specialists in a match
12 Supplies Inbound 100 Ammo supplied by Supply Specialists in a match
13 Doctor's Orders 100 Health restored by Medic Specialists in a match

Special Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Better Late Than Never Land after the first storm forms
2 Still Got 'Em Elimination after being knocked or eliminated
3 Only the Best Have an inventory full of Legendary items or better
4 Rift-Tastic 3 Rifts used in a match
5 Emotional Intelligence 10 Emotes in a match
6 Road Trip 2,500 Damage traveled in a vehicle
7 Thank the Conductor 2,500 Meters traveled on the train in a match

Seasonal Accolades

# Accolade Description
1 Home Run! 1,000 Kneecapper damage in a single match
2 Tools of the Trade 1,000 Damage to Bank Vaults in a match

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds: What Does the Skull Icon on the Map Mean?
item.description:
Monster Hunter Wilds is a game that allows players to fully submerge themselves in a brand-new story and world filled with incredible monsters. It is up to the player to be a good hunter and go out and slay these monsters, but they will want to stay on their toes when it comes to defeating them.

Monster Hunter Wilds features such a massive universe that using the map will be necessary for the player. There are tons of places for players to go and explore, meaning that the map is packed with different icons that give players different indications of where things are or what is happening in their world. Here's what the white skull icon on the map means and how it can help players in Monster Hunter Wilds .

What Does the Skull Icon on the Map Mean in Monster Hunter Wilds?

Monster Hunter Wilds is home to tons of different monsters that players will need to defeat. Whether it be for quests, for slay missions, or even for their satisfaction, doing so allows players to get some better equipment and armor for their character. The point is, being a Monster Hunter, players will find themselves fighting back monsters a lot.

Players will become familiar with pulling out their map every time they want to travel fast or just take note of where different monsters are within the world. The map will showcase many different icons and symbols that will indicate where certain monsters are and, sometimes, even what their health is. This is where the skull icon comes in.

The skull icon is an important one that can help players get that last bit of material they need from monsters quickly. The icon tells players that this monster is incredibly low on health and is trying to run back to its nest to recover . While the icon isn't always promised to show up when a monster is weak, it is still great for the player when it does. It highlights an ideal time for players to go after said monster and slay it.

Paying attention to this icon can help players get more monster kills, and slaying them will be pretty easy given that they are already weak. Those who have already attacked a monster will know that it is almost time for the battle to be over, and victory against such foes will come more quickly than battles against newly encountered enemies.

item.title: Gears of War Collection, E-Day Release Plans Narrowed Down in New Leak
item.description:
Summary

  • According to a new leak. Gears of War: E-Day will be released sometime in 2026.
  • A rumored Gears of War collection may drop later in 2025 to take its place.
  • More concrete information may be revealed during an Xbox showcase this summer.

An industry leaker suggests that Gears of War: E-Day will be released in 2026, and a Gears of War collection will drop later in 2025 to take its place. Gears of War: E-Day was first revealed as part of Xbox's impressive game showcase last June with a nostalgic and sentimental cinematic trailer. A prequel to the original trilogy, Gears of War: E-Day will focus on franchise icon Marcus Fenix and his friendship with fan-favorite COG Dom Santiago on Emergence Day. While the trailer wasn't followed by a release window, rumors suggested it was aiming for a late 2025 release.

Even before Gears of War: E-Day was revealed in 2024, a Halo: The Master Chief Collection -style remastered anthology had been part of the Xbox rumor mill for quite some time. Over the past year, there has been a string of rumors and small pieces of evidence that suggest a Gears of War collection is in the works. In June, Gears of War 2 and 3 musical composer Steve Jablonsky updated the thumbnails of both games' soundtracks on YouTube with The Coalition's studio logo, with both games originally developed by Epic Games. This led to more speculation about a Gears of War collection, as did Phil Spencer's recent revisiting of the earlier Gears games on Xbox this past January.

Now, even more leaked info has come out about both Gears of War: E-Day and the potential Gears of War collection. Spanish leaker eXtas1s posted a new video to YouTube in which he mentioned that Gears of War: E-Day is looking to release in 2026, not 2025 as prior rumors suggested. In its place, he says the Gears of War collection will be revealed at the upcoming June Xbox showcase and released at some point later in 2025 for PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 as well, corroborating others' rumors about Xbox's new multiplatform strategy touching the brand's most sacred first-party franchises. eXtas1s was recently correct in his Forza Horizon 5 to PS5 rumors, so his new Gears claims do hold some weight.

Leaker Suggests Gears Collection Will Drop This Year for PS5, E-Day to Release in 2026

It would make sense for the Gears of War collection to be released on PS5, as it'll allow gamers on that platform the opportunity to grow familiar with the characters before jumping back in time with Gears of War: E-Day , which may also wind up on PS5 at some point down the road. While unknown, the Gears of War collection could consist of the 2015 Gears of War: Ultimate Edition remaster alongside new remastered versions of Gears of War 2 and 3 . Whether the 2013 spinoff Gears of War: Judgment or either of the more recent Kait Diaz-led sequels make it into the collection is also still a mystery.

As eXtas1s said, the Gears of War collection could finally receive its proper reveal at Xbox's Summer Game Fest showcase in June, a date for which should be confirmed in the coming weeks or months. It wouldn't be a surprise to see the reveal be paired with a new Gears of War: E-Day trailer, this time providing a look at gameplay and a release window.

item.title: NASCAR 25, WWE 2K25 Share an Interesting Sports Game Trend
item.description:
The release of WWE 2K25 is imminent, but the wrestling title isn't the only sports game set for a 2025 launch. NASCAR 25 is also set to hit the scene this year, bringing two incredibly popular sports brands back into the world of gaming. On the surface, these two games couldn't be more different, but both have featured legends in their respective franchises to help promote the projects, which has connected WWE 2K25 and NASCAR 25 in a fascinating way.

A recent dev diary from NASCAR 25 developer iRacing featured racing legend Dale Earnhardt Jr. as a spokesperson to help go over some of the features and details players can expect from the game at launch. Of course, Dale Earnhardt Jr. doesn't really have anything to do with WWE, but WWE 2K25 has taken the same approach to promotion by including its own high-profile names in its marketing.

WWE 2K25 and NASCAR 25 Demonstrate How Intertwined Gaming Has Become in Sports Franchises

WWE 2K25 and Paul Heyman

WWE Hall of Famer and manager Paul Heyman is a massive figure in wrestling. As the manager and mentor of superstar Roman Reigns, Heyman continues to have a strong presence in the sport. At the most recent Sony State of Play, Paul Heyman announced WWE 2K25 's The Island, an online hub that features extra content like quests, shops, and live events. Using a major WWE legend like Paul Heyman is a great way to help generate more hype for the game, as he's been with the company for over 11 years total now. Following this trend, NASCAR 2025 is also taking advantage of its most prominent figures.

WWE 2K25 launches on March 14. However, those who have early access can play a full week early on March 7.

Dale Earnhardt Jr. is More Than Just a Mere Spokesperson

It makes total sense for NASCAR 25 to use Dale Earnhardt Jr. as the official racer to promote the upcoming game, but he's played a far more integral role in the project than one might assume. He's also serving as an executive producer on NASCAR 25 . Being so involved in NASCAR 25 's development and promotion is an exciting indication that NASCAR is seeking to make gaming a bigger priority moving forward. Not only does it seem as though NASCAR is taking gaming more seriously, but it appears that the sports industry has truly embraced video games.

NASCAR 25 has yet to reveal a release date, but it's scheduled for fall 2025.

WWE 2K25 and NASCAR Showcase the Rise of Gaming

Sports games aren't new to the gaming industry, but over the years, gaming has become far more prevalent in mainstream pop culture. Gaming was once seen in a different light compared to other forms of entertainment, but it's now just as popular; even more in some cases. Now, the presence of major sports legends like Paul Heyman and Dale Earnhardt Jr. in their respective games' marketing is an exciting example of just how normalized gaming has become in other industries. The features of WWE 2K25 and NASCAR 25 could have been exciting enough if announced by a developer, but having actual high-profile names from each sport push the projects helps solidify these games as not just fun pastimes, but as memorabilia.

Both have featured legends in their respective franchises to help promote the projects, which has connected WWE 2K25 and NASCAR 25 in a fascinating way.

The upcoming arrival of WWE 2K25 and NASCAR 25 seems to have truly embraced the overlap of gamers and sports fans. Instead of just featuring sports stars on covers, playing a part in marketing and announcements adds an extra layer of excitement, marking a strong period for the genre. The willingness of athletes and major figures to promote games based around their sports shows enthusiasm from these massive companies, further proving the reach gaming has gained over time.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows' Thrown to the Dogs Pre-Order Bonus Explained
item.description:
It's not uncommon for any game, especially an Assassin's Creed game, to include an extra quest as a pre-order bonus. In the case of Assassin's Creed Shadows , "Thrown to the Dogs" is available to those who pre-order the game, and it seems like it may be worth it in the end.

Game Rant recently spoke with Assassin's Creed Shadows ' creative director Jonathan Dumont about the game's "Thrown to the Dogs" pre-order bonus quest. While Dumont didn't disclose too many explicit details about the questapart from what has already been revealed about ithe did leave us with an intriguing cliffhanger regarding its story.

Assassin's Creed Shadows' 'Thrown to the Dogs' Pre-Order Bonus Quest

The thought of getting an extra quest as a pre-order bonus may not appeal to everyone, but Assassin's Creed Shadows ' "Thrown to the Dogs" quest may be more than enough reason to do so. Based on what has been revealed about it so far, the quest's story sounds like it could not only be one of the game's more relatable quests but also one of its most emotional. When asked for more details about "Thrown to the Dogs," creative director Jonathan Dumont was tight-lipped about its specific contents, but he did divulge enough to pique one's curiosity:

Thrown to the Dogs is a simple yet heartfelt side quest. Since it's a standalone story, we can say that it's reminiscent of Odyssey's side content. In this quest, the protagonists stumble upon a beaten-up, stray dog that is waiting at a grave. The dog attracts your attention to follow him to the former house of the deceased. There our protagonists undercover some family secrets.

For Dumont to say that "Thrown to the Dogs" is reminiscent of Assassin's Creed Odyssey 's side content may seem like a simple comparison, but it says a lot about the quest's design and the impact that it might have on Assassin's Creed Shadows ' story and its players. A hallmark of some of Assassin's Creed Odyssey 's stronger side quests was their ability to be simple in nature and yet evoke an emotional depth that many side quests aren't known to achieve.

The premise for "Thrown to the Dogs," a stray dog waiting at a grave, immediately signals an emotional hook, possibly dealing with themes of loss, loyalty, and uncovering past tragedies. As such, this quest is likely to be far more than a mere bonus quest and might be reason enough for players to pre-order Assassin's Creed Shadows . This would especially be the case if the "Thrown to the Dogs" quest offers a much more substantial reward besides a captivating short story.

Assassin's Creed Shadows' 'Thrown to the Dogs' Quest Could Lead to a More Substantial Reward

The Assassin's Creed series is no stranger to animal companions, especially Assassin's Creed Valhalla , which even gave players a wolf companion upon completing a certain quest in the game. Thereafter, players could summon the wolf in battle, and it would assist them in subduing their foes. While Ubisoft hasn't said anything about the possibility of the "Thrown to the Dogs" dog joining them as a companion once the quest is complete, it would make sense, considering his owners are deceased and he now has nowhere else to go.

While pre-order bonuses can sometimes feel like mere extras, Assassins Creed Shadows ' "Thrown to the Dogs" quest has the potential to be something far more meaningful. With its emotionally charged premise and hints of deeper narrative significance, this quest could be a standout moment in the game, delivering the kind of heartfelt storytelling that Assassin's Creed Odyssey excelled at. Whether it leads to a loyal companion or offers a glimpse into the world's personal tragedies, it seems like an experience worth having. For those already eager to explore Assassin's Creed Shadows , "Thrown to the Dogs" might just be the perfect incentive to jump in from day one.
